00025    StructureFactorPGrid::StructureFactorPGrid(System& system) 
00026     : StructureFactorP(system),
00027       hMax_(0),
00028       nStar_(0),
00029       lattice_(Triclinic),
00030       isInitialized_(false)
00031    {}
00032 
00034    void StructureFactorPGrid::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00035    {
00036 
00037       nAtomType_ = system().simulation().nAtomType();
00038 
00039       // Read parameters
00040       readInterval(in);
00041       readOutputFileName(in);
00042       read<int>(in, "nAtomTypeIdPair", nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00043       atomTypeIdPairs_.allocate(nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00044       readDArray< Pair<int> >(in, "atomTypeIdPairs", atomTypeIdPairs_, 
00045                                                      nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00046       read<int>(in, "hMax", hMax_);
00047       read<Util::LatticeSystem>(in, "lattice", lattice_);
00048 
00049       // Allocate wavevectors arrays
00050       nWave_     = (2*hMax_ +1 )*(2*hMax_ + 1)*(2*hMax_ + 1);
00051       waveIntVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00052       waveVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00053       fourierModes_.allocate(nWave_, nAtomType_ + 1);
00054       structureFactors_.allocate(nWave_, nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00055 
00056       int i, j, h, k, l, m;
00057       IntVector g;
00058 
00059       // Cubic Symmetry
00060       if (lattice_ == Cubic) {
00061 
00062          nStar_ = (hMax_ +1 )*(hMax_ + 2)*(hMax_ + 3)/6;
00063          starIds_.allocate(nStar_);
00064          starSizes_.allocate(nStar_);
00065    
00066          // Create cubic point group
00067          PointGroup group;
00068          PointSymmetry a, b, c;
00069 
00070          a.R(0,1) =  1;
00071          a.R(1,0) =  1;
00072          a.R(2,2) =  1;
00073    
00074          b.R(0,0) = -1;
00075          b.R(1,1) =  1;
00076          b.R(2,2) =  1;
00077    
00078          c.R(0,1) =  1;
00079          c.R(1,2) =  1;
00080          c.R(2,0) =  1;
00081    
00082          group.add(c);
00083          group.add(b);
00084          group.add(a);
00085          group.makeCompleteGroup();
00086    
00087          // Create grid of wavevectors
00088          FSArray<IntVector, 48> star;
00089          i = 0;
00090          j = 0;
00091          for (h = 0; h <= hMax_; ++h) {
00092             g[0] = h;
00093             for (k = 0; k <= h; ++k) {
00094                g[1] = k;
00095                for (l = 0; l <= k; ++l) {
00096                   g[2] = l;
00097                   starIds_[i] = j;
00098                   group.makeStar(g, star);
00099                   starSizes_[i] = star.size();
00100                   for (m = 0; m < star.size(); ++m) {
00101                      waveIntVectors_[j] = star[m];
00102                      ++j;
00103                   }
00104                   ++i;
00105                }
00106             }
00107          }
00108          if (i != nStar_) {
00109             UTIL_THROW("Error");
00110          } 
00111          if (j != nWave_) {
00112             UTIL_THROW("Error");
00113          } 
00114       }
00115 
00116       // Clear accumulators
00117       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00118          for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00119             structureFactors_(i, j) = 0.0;
00120          }
00121       }
00122       nSample_ = 0;
00123       this->isInitialized_ = true;
00124    }
00125 
00126    void StructureFactorPGrid::setup() 
00127    {}
00128 
00129    void StructureFactorPGrid::output() 
00130    {
00131       double  value, average, size;
00132       int     i, j, k, m, n;
00133 
00134       // Echo parameters to a log file
00135       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00136       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00137       outputFile_.close();
00138 
00139       // Output structure factors to one file
00140       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00141 
00142       // Loop over waves to output structure factor
00143       for (i = 0; i < nStar_; ++i) {
00144          size = starSizes_[i];
00145 
00146          #if 0
00147          // Output individual waves in star
00148          k = starIds_[i];
00149          for (m = 0; m < size; ++m) {
00150             for (n = 0; n < Dimension; ++n) {
00151                outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[k][n], 5);
00152             }
00153             outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[k].abs(), 20, 8);
00154             for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00155                value = structureFactors_(k, j)/double(nSample_);
00156                outputFile_ << Dbl(value, 20, 8);
00157             }
00158             outputFile_ << std::endl;
00159             ++k;
00160          }
00161          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00162          #endif
00163 
00164          k = starIds_[i];
00165          for (n = 0; n < Dimension; ++n) {
00166             outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[k][n], 5);
00167          }
00168          outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[k].abs(), 20, 8);
00169          for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00170             k = starIds_[i];
00171             average = 0.0;
00172             for (m = 0; m < size; ++m) {
00173                 value = structureFactors_(k, j)/double(nSample_);
00174                 average += value;
00175                 ++k;
00176             }
00177             average = average/double(size);
00178             outputFile_ << Dbl(average, 20, 8);
00179          }
00180          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00181 
00182       }
00183 
00184       outputFile_.close();
00185 
00186       #if 0
00187       // Output each structure factor to a separate file
00188       std::string suffix;
00189       int         typeId;
00190       for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00191 
00192          // Construct file suffix for this structure factor
00193          suffix = std::string(".");
00194          for (k = 0; k < 2; k++) {
00195             typeId = atomTypeIdPairs_[j][k];
00196             if (typeId < 0) {
00197                suffix += std::string("A");
00198             } else {
00199                suffix += toString(typeId);
00200             }
00201          }
00202          suffix += std::string(".dat");
00203 
00204          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(suffix), outputFile_);
00205 
00206 
00207 
00208          // Loop over waves to output structure factor
00209 
00210          outputFile_.close();
00211       }
00212       #endif
00213 
00214    }
00215 
00216 }
